body_html:
Thanks for reporting this. This seems to be an issue with convs and fully connected layers that was fixed for DepthwiseConvs in this commit 3a17101#diff-ca0f46c80fd3cf1f2040be6147a2d8cf

We likely need a similar fix for Conv and FC as well.
body_text:
Thanks for reporting this. This seems to be an issue with convs and fully connected layers that was fixed for DepthwiseConvs in this commit 3a17101#diff-ca0f46c80fd3cf1f2040be6147a2d8cf
We likely need a similar fix for Conv and FC as well.
body:
Thanks for reporting this. This seems to be an issue with convs and fully connected layers that was fixed for DepthwiseConvs in this commit https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/3a17101171d3e51fcba2189d09416c5106bfe4ac#diff-ca0f46c80fd3cf1f2040be6147a2d8cf

We likely need a similar fix for Conv and FC as well.
